SELECT l.id as id, l.create_date as createDate, l.modify_date as modifyDate, l.data_status as dataStatus, l.name as name, l.member_id as memberId, m.mobile as memberMobile, l.follow_up_id as followUpId, u.username as followUpName, l.state as state, l.state_describe as stateDescribe, l.bank_name as bankName FROM dj_member_loan l INNER JOIN dj_member m ON l.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN dj_user u ON l.follow_up_id = u.id WHERE l.data_status =0
and l.state = #{state}
and ( m.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or l.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or u.username like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%'))
ORDER by l.create_date
